page.title: 16PONY RIDING IN THE DEARNE
page.content: Sandra Couldron owns{four ponies.}She rented the Stables at Rectory Lane, Thurnscoe from Mr. Gascoigne who recently died so his wife owns them now. She rents out{three stables.}One is a double one, to Sandra. She used to own a paddock but the Council were planning to build on it so Sandra had to give it up. There are lots of people, mostly girls who own a horse or pony, who rent a Stable from Mrs. Gascoigne. Sandra has a goat as well. It is in the double stable with Chess and Blossom who are two of her ponies. The other two are Annabell and Moonlight. There are about{20 people who go riding with Sandra.
